Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Special Effects: You can move 2 squares before the attack
Description: A final lunge brings you into an advantageous position.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Description: A needle-sharp point slips past armor and into tender flesh.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hit Effects: If the target attacks you before the start of your next turn% you make your riposte against the target as an immediate interrupt: a Strength vs. AC attack that deals 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Damage Increase at 21: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier and riposte to 2[W] + Strength modifier
Description: With a calculated strike% you leave your foe vulnerable to an adroit riposte should he dare attack you.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Description: A distracting flourish causes the enemy to forget the blade at his throat.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hit Effects: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Description: An expert strike catches your foe by surprise and leaves him reeling from the pain.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Effects: Switch places with a willing adjacent ally.
Description: It’s hard to get to the little guy when he takes cover behind an ally who can crush plate armor in his teeth.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Special Effects: If you posess the Artful Dodger tactic% you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier instead.
Description: A false stumble and a shove place the enemy exactly where you want him.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Special Effects: If you posess the Brutal Scoundrel tactic% you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Strength modifier.
Description: If you twist the blade in the wound just so% you can make your enemy howl in pain.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light thrown weapon% or a sling.
Primary Target: Each enemy in blast you can see
Hit Effects: The target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Miss Effects: Half damage% and the target is not blinded.
Description: A rapid barrage of projectiles leaves your enemies clearing the blood from their eyes.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Hit Effects: The target is slowed and grants combat advantage to you (save ends both).
Miss Effects: Half damage% and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
Description: You deal a staggering blow to your enemy% setting it up for future attacks.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Effects: Until the end of the encounter% each time you hit the target you slide it 1 square.
Description: Through a series of feints and lures% you maneuver your foe right where you want him.

Requirement: null
Effects: You can move your speed and make a Stealth check. You do not take the normal penalty from movement on this check.
Description: You are stealthy and fleet of foot at the same time.

Requirement: null
Effects: Make a high jump or a long jump. Determine the DC of the Athletics check as though you had a running start. The distance you jump can exceed your speed.
Description: You leap a great distance without a running start.

Requirement: null
Trigger: You roll a Bluff check and dislike the result
Effects: Reroll the Bluff check. You decide whether to make the reroll before the DM announces the result.
Description: The line between truth and deception is thin% and you cross it with ease.

Requirement: null
Effects: Make a Thievery check as part of this action% even if the check is normally a standard action.
Description: You can pilfer a coin pouch in the blink of an eye.

Requirement: null
Effects: You can shift a number of squares equal to one-half your speed.
Description: You tumble out of harm’s way% dodging the opportunistic attacks of your enemies.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hit Effects: You switch places with the target and can then shift 1 square.
Special Effects: If you posess the Artful Dodger tactic% you can shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier instead.
Description: You strike and weave% causing your foe to lurch forward so that you can duck around him and slip into his space.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hit Effects: The target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
Description: You land a calculated blow that causes your enemy to drop his guard% leaving him vulnerable to subsequent attacks.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Special Effects: If you posess the Brutal Scoundrel tactic% you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Strength modifier.
Description: Balance and momentum are your allies as you lunge forward% strike deftly% and knock your opponent to the ground.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Hit Effects: Add your Charisma modifier to your AC until the start of your next turn.
Description: You land an expert blow and follow up with a clever series of feints that bewilder your enemies.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Effects: Until the end of the encounter% the target takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier each time it attacks you% and you can shift as an immediate reaction after such an attack.
Description: You follow up a fierce attack with a series of quick% painful strikes woven between your enemy’s attacks.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hit Effects: Ongoing damage equal to 5 + your Strength modifier (save ends).
Miss Effects: Half damage% and no ongoing damage.
Description: Each drop of blood is another nail in your enemy’s coffin.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Hit Effects: The target is knocked prone. Until the end of the encounter% if the target moves more than half its speed in a single action% it falls prone at the end of its movement.
Miss Effects: Half damage% and the target is not knocked prone.
Description: You topple your enemy with a crippling blow and force him to stumble around the battlefield.

Requirement: null
Trigger: You are hidden and lose cover or concealment against an opponent
Effects: Make a Stealth check. Until the end of your next turn% you remain hidden if a creature that has a clear line of sight to you does not beat your check result with its Perception check. If at the end of your turn you do not have cover or concealment against a creature% that creature automatically notices you.
Description: You blend into your surroundings.

Requirement: null
Effects: If you are marked% end that condition. You can shift a number of squares equal to your speed.
Description: With nimble ease% you sidestep one perilous situation after another.

Requirement: null
Primary Target: You and each ally in burst
Effects: The targets gain a +2 power bonus to Charisma-based skill and ability checks until the end of your next turn.
Description: When it comes to lying% cajoling% or persuading others% your allies follow your lead.

Requirement: null
Effects: Make an Athletics check to climb a surface. You can move at your full speed during this climb.
Description: You climb surfaces with astounding ease.

Requirement: null
Trigger: You are hit by an attack against your Will defense
Effects: Gain a +2 power bonus to your Will defense against the triggering attack.
Description: You cloud your mind with vague thoughts that shield you against a sudden mental attack.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light thrown weapon% or a sling.
Primary Target: Each enemy in blast you can see
Description: You shower your enemies in sharp metal.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hit Effects: The target takes a –1 penalty to AC and Reflex defense until the end of your next turn.
Special Effects: If you posess the Brutal Scoundrel tactic% the penalty to AC and Reflex defense is equal to your Strength modifier.
Description: You deal a staggering blow% opening a hole in your enemy’s defenses.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Miss Effects: Make a secondary attack against the target.
Special Effects: If you posess the Artful Dodger tactic% you gain a bonus to the attack roll for the secondary attack equal to your Charisma modifier.
Description: A gifted rogue can turn failure into fortune.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hit Effects: The target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Description: You scoop up a handful of sand or dirt or pebbles% strike your foe% and throw the grit in his face to blind him.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hit Effects: The target takes ongoing damage equal to 5 + your Strength modifier and grants combat advantage to you (save ends both).
Miss Effects: Half damage% and no ongoing damage.
Description: You deal your enemy a vicious wound that continues to bleed% and like a shark% you circle in for the kill.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Effects: Until the end of the encounter% as long as you are adjacent to the target% you slide the target 1 square before making a melee attack against it.
Special Effects: Before making the attack% you slide the target to any other square adjacent to you.
Description: You adroitly outmaneuver your enemy% pushing and baiting him with every stride and strike.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hit Effects: The target is knocked unconscious (save ends). If the unconscious target takes any damage% it is no longer unconscious.
Miss Effects: Half damage% and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Description: A well-placed blow takes your foe out of the fight.

Requirement: null
Effects: You automatically succeed on an Acrobatics check to escape from a grab or to escape from restraints.
Description: You are as slippery as an eel.

Requirement: null
Effects: Move into the space of an adjacent creature larger than you and at least Large in size. (It gets its usual opportunity attack against you as you leave an adjacent square.) You gain combat advantage against the creature% and it takes a –4 penalty to attack rolls against you. When the creature moves% you move along with it% staying in the same portion of the creature’s space. The creature can make a Strength or Dexterity vs. Reflex attack (as a standard action with no penalty) to slide you into an adjacent square and end this effect.
Special Effects: Allies of the target creature can attack you without penalty.
Description: You take cover beneath a much larger creature% making it harder for the creature to hit you.

Requirement: null
Effects: On your next action% ignore the –10 penalty when you make a Thievery check to pick a pocket during combat.
Description: You snatch an item from an enemy during combat.

Requirement: null
Effects: You must be hiding to use this power. You can move your speed. At the end of that movement% if you have cover% you can make a Stealth check with no penalty for moving. If you make the Stealth check% you stay hidden during your movement.
Description: You silently step from shadow to shadow% slipping past your foes unseen and unheard.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hit Effects: The target takes damage as if it were hit by its own melee basic attack. If you have combat advantage against the target% you can add your Sneak Attack damage.
Description: You bait your foe into attacking you% and then turn his blow straight back at him.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hit Effects: The target is stunned until the end of your next turn.
Description: A well-timed attack leaves your enemy flailing helplessly for a few critical seconds.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Effects: Make two attacks. You can move 3 squares after making the attack.
Special Effects: If you posess the Artful Dodger tactic% you slide the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier.
Description: Your weapon becomes a blur as you make swift% sweeping attacks against two foes% then hastily slip away.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hit Effects: The target cannot shift until the end of your next turn. If the target provokes an opportunity attack from you before the start of your next turn% you gain a bonus to the attack roll and damage roll with the opportunity attack equal to your Strength modifier% and you knock the target prone on a hit.
Description: Ducking and weaving% you land a decisive blow that staggers your foe and sets it up for a tripping attack.

Requirement: null
Effects: You can move your speed. Every enemy that can make an opportunity attack against you as a result of this movement attacks itself with its opportunity attack% rather than you. Any enemy that can make an opportunity attack against you during this movement must do so. It cannot refrain from making the attack to avoid harming itself.
Description: You dash across the battlefield% leaving bewildered and bleeding enemies in your wake.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Sustain Action: Minor: Sustain the grab for another round. The third time you sustain the grab after using this power% the target falls unconscious. If an unconscious target takes any damage% it is no longer unconscious.
Hit Effects: You grab the target. Until the target escapes% you have cover% and any melee attack or ranged attack that misses you hits the target instead.
Special Effects: You can use this power as a minor action if you have already grabbed a creature. Doing so requires no attack roll.
Description: The more your enemy struggles% the less you want to let him go.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Special Effects: If the target is bloodied% this attack does 5[W] + Dexterity modifier + Strength modifier damage on a hit (half damage on a miss) and can score a critical hit on a roll of 17–20.
Description: A ruthless strike yields great rewards% for after death comes the looting.

Requirement: null
Effects: On your next action% gain a +10 power bonus when you make a Thievery check to open a lock. If the check succeeds% the lock opens at once.
Description: You tug on a lock a certain way% and just like that% it snaps open.

Requirement: You must already be hidden.
Effects: You are invisible until you leave your current square. No other action that you perform makes you visible.
Description: You stand unseen in the midst of the battle% striking from your place of hiding.

Requirement: null
Trigger: An enemy targets you with an attack
Effects: Make an Athletics check to jump with a +5 power bonus and move the appropriate distance.
Description: You leap out of harm’s way just in time to avoid an attack.

Requirement: null
Effects: Until the end of your next turn% any of your attacks can score a critical hit on a roll of 17–20% and any attack against you can score a critical hit on a roll of 19–20.
Description: You focus on the precision of your attacks% at the expense of hiding the chinks in your own armor.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Hit Effects: If the target attacks you before the start of your next turn% you can attack it again as an immediate interrupt and deal 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage if you hit.
Special Effects: If you posess the Brutal Scoundrel tactic% the attack you make as an immediate interrupt gains a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Strength modifier.
Description: First you set them up% and then you knock them down.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Hit Effects: Until the end of your next turn% you gain combat advantage against the target and a +1 power bonus to all defenses against its attacks.
Special Effects: If you posess the Artful Dodger tactic% the power bonus is equal to your Charisma modifier.
Description: With snarling ferocity% you attack. Your weapon bites deep into your enemy’s flesh% filling his heart with doubt.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hit Effects: You grab the target. If you have already grabbed the target% it is restrained instead of immobilized until it escapes your grab. The target can attempt to escape the grab as normal.
Description: Keep your friends close% and your enemies at knifepoint.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Sustain Action: Minor: Sustain the penalty for another round.
Effects: Until the end of your next turn% all of the target’s defenses against your attacks take a penalty equal to your Charisma modifier.
Description: A series of clever feints throws your foe off his game and makes him an easy target.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hit Effects: You slide the target a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier. If an obstacle (including a creature) arrests the slide% both the target and the obstacle take 1d6 damage and the target ends its movement in the square it occupied before it collided with the obstacle.
Miss Effects: You slide the target a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier% and no damage from obstacles.
Description: Mastering your foe’s reactions allows you to toss him about like a rag doll.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Effects: When the target makes a melee attack or a ranged attack against you% you can shift 1 square as an immediate interrupt. The target can make a saving throw to end this effect.
Description: After striking boldly% you frustrate your foe by shifting away just as he’s about to attack you.

Requirement: null
Effects: Make two consecutive Athletics checks to jump% with a +5 power bonus to each. You don’t have to land between the jumps and can exceed your normal movement.
Description: You leap a phenomenal distance.

Requirement: null
Effects: You can shift twice your speed. You can climb at full speed as part of this move. If an enemy attacks you while you shift% you gain a +4 bonus to AC against that attack.
Description: With nearly inhuman speed and percision% you slip away from a foe’s attack.

Requirement: null
Effects: You must already be hidden to use this power. You are invisible until the end of the encounter or until you end the effect by moving more than 2 squares in a turn or by making any attack other than a basic attack or an at-will attack.
Description: As long as you take your time% you can move about the battlefield unseen.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Miss Effects: The target makes a melee basic attack as a free action against an adjacent target other than you. You choose the target of its attack.
Special Effects: If you posess the Artful Dodger tactic% the attack you cause with a miss gains a bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.
Description: You make a decisive attack. Failing that% you cause your startled enemy to strike at another nearby foe.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Trigger: An ally damages a creature adjacent to you
Special Effects: If you posess the Brutal Scoundrel tactic% shift a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier after this attack% whether or not you hit.
Description: One of your allies deals a timely blow to your enemy% and like a scorpion% you strike.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light thrown weapon% or a sling.
Primary Target: Each enemy in blast you can see
Hit Effects: The target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Description: Glittering blades pin your foes in place before any of them have a chance to blink% let alone run away.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Hit Effects: The target takes ongoing 10 damage and is weakened (save ends both).
Miss Effects: Half damage% and the target takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Description: You strike with deadly ferocity to sap your foe’s strength.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Hit Effects: You become invisible. You move into any square adjacent to the target and reappear at the start of your next turn. You have combat advantage against the target until the end of your next turn.
Miss Effects: Half damage% you can shift 1 square to another square adjacent to the target% and you have combat advantage against the target until the end of your next turn.
Description: You vanish% then strike out of nowhere!

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Hit Effects: The target takes ongoing 10 damage and is slowed (save ends both).
Miss Effects: Half damage% and the target takes ongoing 5 damage and is slowed (save ends both).
Description: You hobble your opponent with a ruthless slash across the legs% leaving him barely able to walk.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Primary Target: Each enemy in burst you can see
Hit Effects: If the target makes a melee attack against you before the end of your next turn% you can make it attack another creature of your choice instead% including itself.
Special Effects: If you posess the Artful Dodger tactic% the targets gain a bonus to the attack rolls provoked by this power equal to your Charisma modifier
Description: You duck and dodge your enemies’ attacks% striking as opportunity allows while expertly deflecting attacks made against you.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Special Effects: If you posess the Brutal Scoundrel tactic% the attack gains a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Strength modifier.
Description: You stab and slash your foe mercilessly% spilling copious amounts of blood.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Hit Effects: Add an extra 1[W] damage if the attack hits two defenses. The target is also stunned until the end of your next turn if the attack hits all three defenses.
Special Effects: You make one attack roll% and you hit if the roll equals or exceeds any of the three defenses.
Description: Your enemy doesn’t know what hit it.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Special Effects: Special: If you have combat advantage against the target% double any extra damage from Sneak Attack or a critical hit.
Description: A sliced throat or a bolt through the heart—it’s all good.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Hit Effects: The target is immobilized (save ends). If the target succeeds on its saving throw% it is slowed (save ends). Saving throws against these effects take a –5 penalty.
Miss Effects: Half damage% and the target is slowed (save ends). Saving throws against this effect take a –5 penalty.
Description: With terrifying ease% you slash at your enemy’s exposed tendons and leave him immobilized and whimpering in pain.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Trigger: A creature makes a melee attack or a ranged attack against you
Hit Effects: Instead of attacking you% the target attacks a creature you choose within 2 squares of you. You must choose a creature that the target can attack.
Miss Effects: The target’s attack is made against you as normal% but deals half damage if it hits.
Description: An attack meant for you hits another creature instead.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Effects: Shift to any square adjacent to the target.
Description: You spring into action% expertly strike% and then sidestep to position yourself for either certain glory or imminent doom.

Requirement: null
Trigger: You become immobilized% restrained% or slowed
Effects: You end any of the above conditions that currently afflict you. Then you can shift 2 squares.
Description: With supreme effort% you escape.

Requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee attack and can reach another enemy
Hit Effects: The target’s attack misses you and hits an enemy of your choice within range of the target’s attack.
Description: The weapon races toward you% but with a slight move and a flourish of your own blade% you redirect the attack toward a different target.

Requirement: You must be wielding a dagger and have scored a critical hit with a dagger against an enemy during this turn.
Primary Target: The same creature you hit with a critical hit
Description: Your first attack deals a critical wound% so you follow the attack with another strike.

Requirement: null
Effects: Until the end of the encounter% your dagger’s damage die increases by one size.
Description: With a moment of concentration% you focus your will into the point of your blade.

Requirement: You must be wielding a dagger.
Hit Effects: Ongoing 10 damage (save ends). On a critical hit% ongoing 20 damage (save ends).
Miss Effects: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage% and no ongoing damage.
Description: Your dagger springs forward% plunging deep into your foe.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Primary Target: One creature you have combat advantage against
Hit Effects: The target grants combat advantage to you and all your allies until the end of your next turn.
Description: You strike from the shadows% delivering a wound that distracts your foe and makes him drop his guard.

Requirement: null
Effects: You become invisible until the start of your next turn.
Description: With practiced ease% you step into the shadows and disappear from view.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Miss Effects: Half damage% and no ongoing damage.
Description: Your weapon bites deep% puncturing your enemy and leaving a lingering wound.

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Special Effects: If this attack is made before the target has acted in the encounter% increase the weapon damage to 3[W].
Description: You strike with a killer’s eye% seeking to take down your enemy as quickly and efficiently as possible.

Requirement: null
Trigger: An adjacent enemy makes a melee attack against you for the first time during this encounter
Effects: Gain a +10 power bonus to all defenses against the enemy’s attack. If the attack misses% the enemy takes double your Shadow Assassin’s Riposte damage.
Special Effects: If you are granting combat advantage% you cannot use this power.
Description: null

Requirement: You must be wielding a crossbow% a light blade% or a sling.
Hit Effects: You shift a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier. You must end this movement adjacent to an enemy.
Description: Your enemy is wounded. This shot will finish it off.
